trans-unit.source: Represents a polygon annotation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation"></xref> class.
Gets the annotation type.
For internal use, should not be used.
The annotation type.
Gets or sets the background color of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
Gets or sets the background gradient style of an annotation.

Two colors are used to draw the gradient fill; the primary color is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property and the secondary color is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
Gets or sets the background hatch style of an annotation.

Two colors are used to draw the hatching fill; the primary color is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property and the secondary color is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
Gets or sets the secondary color of the annotation background.

This secondary color is used with a primary color, defined with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
This property is not applicable to the polygon annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polygon annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> value.
This property is not applicable to the polygon annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polygon annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> value.
